description: Load an extension by its module path. Loading an AFW package's manifest extension will register the manifest of all extensions in the package.

parameters.description: This is the path to the dso containing the extension. If the extension is installed in the normal place, the library name without a file extension (.so) will suffice.
parameters.name: module_path

returns.description: The extension id of the extension loaded.

sideEffects: The loading of the extension may add environment registry entries as well as make other changes.
